From: Lars Noschinski <noschinl@in.tum.de>
atac does less then assumption, Method.assm_tac is closer.

-- Lars

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Using an outdated repository version from 2 weeks ago is pointless. On
the repository you need to follow within a few days to make any sense.

We are presently at http://isabelle.in.tum.de/website-Isabelle2015-RC3
from yesterday.

Makarius
